name: The Guardian Newspaper Pebble Watchface
tagline: The latest headlines from The Guardian Newspaper. Updated every 30 seconds. On your Pebble.
body:
![](https://s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/owlandgiraffe/guardian/header.png)

Displays headlines alongside the time. So you can stay up-to-date and in-time. 

Cycle faster through headlines by tapping your Pebble.  

(Requires bluetooth and data connection)

Powered by [The Guardian](http://theguardian.com). 
Built by [Owl & Giraffe](http://owlandgiraffe.com).

Let us know what you think or if you have any problems [@owlandgiraffe](http://twitter.com/@owlandgiraffe).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
